TopicTitle: Trying to move part upgrades to different tech nodes

Articles.Content: So I asked this a few months ago on the Unkerbaled Start thread, I've been trying to make my own compatibility patch to move some unsupported parts (Wildblue Industries add-ons I believe) around in the tech tree so that they fit into the progression better. I have managed to move parts around fine enough, but Wildblue uses part performance upgrades as well and they apparently can't be moved the same way like parts can. Does anyone know how to move part upgrades to different nodes?

On 9/27/2023 at 6:30 PM, EleSigma said:

So I asked this a few months ago on the Unkerbaled Start thread, I've been trying to make my own compatibility patch to move some unsupported parts (Wildblue Industries add-ons I believe) around in the tech tree so that they fit into the progression better. I have managed to move parts around fine enough, but Wildblue uses part performance upgrades as well and they apparently can't be moved the same way like parts can. Does anyone know how to move part upgrades to different nodes?

I don't have a detailed way of doing it and I'm away from my machine... nor can i remember the exact mechanisms i use...

But kerbalism Simplex changes upgrades as per tech tree.  It'll be in the Kerbalism Simplex/System/RedoneScience or something and called upgrades.

Simplex Propulsion does as add this as well. Have a look at those.
